name: Custom itslearning
description:
Custom itslearning, you choose how itslearning looks

FEATURES:
PDF files are blend-in
Office online files are blend-in
Cleaner design
More up-to-date design
Easily customizable
Cleaner design
Preset themes
Mobile support

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles:
https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui

user.name: Zhou Yahui
user.about:
Hi, I'm Zhou.

I make CSS themes I guess.

additional_info:
V1: Release
V1.1.2: Improvements to Posts and Courses menu.
V1.2.1: 25% of calendar is themed correctly - improvements - button hover fix - fixes
V1.3: Calendar themed
V1.3.3: PDF Toolbar themed, emoticon hover themed, fix
V1.3.4: Unread notification themed
V1.4: Assignments themed. 
V1.4.1: Fixes
V1.5.2: Office Online Themed, PDF changes (not finished)
V1.6.15: Further Office Online improvements, Powerpoint Online support, Itslearning tests support(!), tweaks and fixes
V1.7.7: Excel Online improvements, Text fixes (itslearning changed text colors), other fixes and improvements.
V1.7.12: Hover color improvements, Personal Menu improvements, Course homepage improvements, themed notifications correctly, removed borders from both messages and notifications.
V1.7.14: Messages improvements (search themed), further Excel Online improvements.
V.1.7.21: fixes and improvements
V1.8: New Homepage themed, (early version)
V2: Renamed to "Custom itslearning", style is now a custom theme
V2.1: quick major fixes
V2.2 Homepage image is customizable, important fixes
V3: added preset themes, Luminous Blue, Pure Light, True Black, GX, R3
V3.1.2: fixed background images sometimes not covering page, removed Pure Light theme, fixed GX
V3.1.3: calendar text fix
V3.1.4: important fixes, removed GX
V3.1.5: all messages fix
V3.2: many fixes
V3.2.1: fix
V3.2.2: fixes
V3.3: added R32 theme, fixes
V3.3.1: span fix
V3.3.2: span fix part 2
V3.4: span fix part 3, accent improvements, removed border and button text customization, fixes, word online comments, evaluation
V3.4.1: mobile fix
V3.4.2: span fix part 4, calendar fix, pdf fix, improvements
V3.4.3: fixes
V3.4.4: login screen, fixes and improvements, removed r32
V3.5: extensions support, fixes and improvements
V3.6: New preset themes, fixes and improvements
V3.6.1: improvements
V3.7: new preset themes
V3.8: marked text now matches accent color
V3.8.1: fixed Excel sheets, other fixes and improvements
V3.8.2: fixes and improvements
